pokemons.name: Bulbasaur
pokemons.bio: There is a plant seed on its back right from the day this Pok√©mon is born. The seed slowly grows larger.

pokemons.name: Ivysaur
pokemons.bio: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.

pokemons.name: Venusaur
pokemons.bio: Its plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

pokemons.name: Charmander
pokemons.bio: It has a preference for hot things. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

pokemons.name: Charmeleon
pokemons.bio: It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it whips its fiery tail around and slashes away with sharp claws.

pokemons.name: Charizard
pokemons.bio: It spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. It may cause forest fires by blowing flames.

pokemons.name: Squirtle
pokemons.bio: When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it squirts out water with vigorous force.

pokemons.name: Wartortle
pokemons.bio: It is recognized as a symbol of longevity. If its shell has algae on it, that Wartortle is very old.

pokemons.name: Blastoise
pokemons.bio: It crushes its foe under its heavy body to cause fainting. In a pinch, it will withdraw inside its shell.

pokemons.name: Caterpie
pokemons.bio: For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antenna on its head to drive away enemies.

pokemons.name: Metapod
pokemons.bio: It is waiting for the moment to evolve. At this stage, it can only harden, so it remains motionless to avoid attack.

pokemons.name: Butterfree
pokemons.bio: In battle, it flaps its wings at great speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.

pokemons.name: Weedle
pokemons.bio: Beware of the sharp stinger on its head. It hides in grass and bushes where it eats leaves.

pokemons.name: Kakuna
pokemons.bio: Able to move only slightly. When endangered, it may stick out its stinger and poison its enemy.

pokemons.name: Beedrill
pokemons.bio: It has three poisonous stingers on its forelegs and its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.
